backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing user profiles, places, routes, emergency data, SOS snapshots, and access‑controlled CRUD operations with mixin-based storage and authorization.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing flyer‑export related features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style mapping of many frontend file paths to short human-written summaries describing their purpose.
Manual smoke‑test checklist for verifying flyer download, auto‑export, copy link, error handling, and regressions across browsers and devices.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables and dark‑mode color definitions for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, layout, and pages including flyer route with autoExportFlyer search validation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Renders an access-denied message with an icon and a button to navigate home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Checks if the user is an admin and shows loading or access denied screens before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Requires an authenticated identity and shows a login prompt if the user is not logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, sidebar navigation, mobile menu, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Navigation menu showing main app routes and admin options based on user role.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Top header with branding, share button, emergency lookup link, and login button.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Manages creation, rotation, display, and copying of a user's emergency access code and principal ID.
Form for saving next-of-kin and health details, requiring an existing emergency access code.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and create a new profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Card for uploading and validating license and ID files, showing upload progress and current verification status.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Flyer-style preview displaying branding, intro text, a QR code canvas, and the share URL.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Dialog that generates a shareable URL and QR code with options to copy, share, or download the QR image.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Public emergency info view showing driver details, contacts, health info, and last known SOS location with map link.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading stored identities and handling login state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: React hook that generates QR codes on a canvas with timeout protection and abort handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, verification, places, and related mutations using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a 12‑character emergency access code in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Utility for copying text to the clipboard with secure-context checks and fallback methods.
frontend/src/lib/domToPng.ts: Empty file placeholder for DOM‑to‑PNG functionality.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates uploaded files for size and type and provides human-readable file size formatting.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Renders a flyer and QR canvas into a high-resolution PNG using manual canvas drawing.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Wraps browser geolocation into a promise with detailed error messages.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Maps backend place categories to labels and provides helper utilities for category options.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Implements a standards-based QR code generator with module setup, error correction, and data mapping.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Provides a function to download a canvas as a PNG with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Implements Web Share API sharing with clipboard fallback and detailed status results.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the app’s canonical share URL based on window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Converts between Date and bigint timestamps and formats dates for display.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading and clearing URL parameters in both query and hash-based routes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Main React entry point setting up providers and rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page for creating a new place with validation, mutation, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating a route, converting date input, and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminReviewPage.tsx: Admin interface for looking up users and approving or rejecting verification requests.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: UI for entering a principal ID and access code to fetch and display emergency profile data, with loading and validation states.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Generates a shareable flyer with QR code, supports auto-export, manual download, and link copying.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing screen showing feature highlights and redirecting authenticated users to the places list.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a selected place, including description, category, and submitter.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Lists searchable and filterable safe places with an option to add new ones for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page showing user info plus verification uploads and emergency profile sections.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder page showing a simple route detail view with navigation back to the routes list.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Displays the user's routes and allows searching routes by principal, with navigation to add new routes.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Shows the user's emergency SOS card, loading emergency data and linking back to the SOS screen.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Allows users to capture a one-time SOS location snapshot and navigate to view their SOS card.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, issues, architectural notes, and implemented features.
